name: Escape From Memories
description:
Escape from Memories is a narrative adventure game. You wake up in a room that is unknown to you, filled with elements that remind you of your childhood. By solving the riddle and using your memories, find out what happened, who locked you in and why?

Features of the game:

 -A dark atmosphere, juggling between adult life and childhood.

 -A toony artistic direction contrasting with the unhealthy atmosphere of this strange adventure.

-A disturbing story to discover through many elements hidden in the scenery.

 -Explore a mysterious apartment cut off from the outside world and interact with the many elements at your disposal. 

-Find notes to understand what you may have done.

-Solve simple but intelligent puzzles that will take you back to your childhood.
